Tag: Tanya Blount

An American singer, musician, and former Army Veteran, Michael Trotter Jr. gained recognition as the spouse of singer Tanya Blount. Together, they form the dynamic duo at the forefront of the rootsy band known as The War and Treaty.

Michael Trotter Jr.’s Wikipedia

Who Is Michael Trotter Jr.? Biography & Age

Renowned as a singer, musician, and former army veteran, Michael Trotter Jr. has garnered attention through notable appearances on shows like CBS News Sunday Morning with Jane Pauley (2019), Lost Art Music Festival 2021: The Short Film (2022), GMA3: What You Need to Know (2023), and as a pivotal member of The War and Treaty.

Despite his online popularity, Michael Trotter Jr. lacks a dedicated Wikipedia page, prompting a surge in internet searches for insights into his biography and personal life. Born and raised in the United States, details about his parents and siblings are elusive, as the singer prefers to keep his private life away from the media’s scrutiny.

Mysterious in more ways than one, Michael Trotter Jr.’s birthdate, age, and zodiac sign remain undisclosed. Estimates suggest he might be in his mid-40s, with a height of around 5 feet 8 inches (1.72 m) and a weight of approximately 95 kg (209 lbs). While his American nationality and mixed ethnicity are known, information regarding his educational background remains undisclosed. Michael adheres to the Christian faith, adding another layer to the enigma surrounding this multifaceted artist.

Michael Trotter Jr.’s Wife

Michael Trotter Jr. is happily married to his former girlfriend, now wife, Tanya Blount, with the couple exchanging vows in the presence of loved ones, although the exact wedding date remains undisclosed.

Tanya Blount, his wife, is a versatile American personality known for her roles as an actress, musician, and author. Her notable television appearances include Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit (1993), Life Story of Marvin Gaye (2005), The Family That Preys (2008), and I Am Black and I Am Proud.

As the lead vocalists of the rootsy band The War and Treaty, Michael Trotter Jr. and Tanya Blount share not only their musical talents but also their journey as parents to four children—two daughters and two sons. However, the media remains unaware of their names.

Net Worth & Career

Accumulating an estimated net worth of around $1 million, Michael Trotter Jr. has built his fortune through a successful career as a singer and musician. In addition to his musical pursuits, he boosts his income through brand endorsements, sponsorship deals, concerts, and events.

Fueling his passion for music from a young age, Michael Trotter Jr. underwent musical training and showcased his talents in various concerts and events. Before making a name for himself in the music industry, he served as an Army War Veteran in Iraq as part of the United States Armed Forces.

Among his notable songs are Till the Morning, Healing Tide, Beautiful, Jubilee, The Best That I Have, We Are One, Lonely In My Grief, Hearts, I Had a Talk With God, Angel, Five More Minutes, A Sunday Kind of Love, Up Yonder, Hey Pretty Moon, Stretch Out, Lover’s Game, Blank Page, Dumb Luck, It’s Only Rock ‘N’ Roll, Ain’t No Harmin’ Me, Set My Soul on Fire, Cold, and many more.

In addition to being the husband of singer Tanya Blount, Michael Trotter Jr. is a well-known American singer, musician, and former Army veteran. He is also half of the dynamic duo that plays with the rootsy band The War and Treaty.

Born and raised in America, Michael has kept a low profile when it comes to personal concerns and has decided to withhold information about his parents and siblings. Although the gifted artist’s actual age and date of birth are unknown, his physical characteristics—he appears to be in his mid-40s based on his height and weight—which put him at roughly 5 feet 8 inches and 95 kilograms.

Michael Trotter Jr. is a multitalented individual who gained vast and varied life experiences as an Army War Veteran while serving in the United States Armed Forces. He started a musical career, joining his wife Tanya Blount as lead vocalist in The War and Treaty. The married couple, who have four kids, has emerged as a musical powerhouse, exhibiting their talent in a number of noteworthy ventures.

Michael has served in the military and performed on shows including GMA3: What You Need to Know, Lost Art Music Festival, and CBS News Sunday Morning. He has a $1 million estimated net worth thanks to his significant contributions to the business, commitment to his profession, and earnings from live performances, endorsements, sponsorships, and music.
